FuncDef: The display acr-dcr command displays the current CES ACR information.

ParaDef.Info:
Clock recovery domain value.
The value is an integer ranging from 1 to 8.

Slot ID of the board providing the interface whose ACR information is to be displayed.
The value is a string of 1 to 16, not case-sensitive characters, spaces not supported.

ID of the subcard providing the interface whose CES ACR information is to be displayed.
The value is an integer ranging from 0 to 4294967295.

Clock master domain value.
The value is an integer ranging from 1 to 32.

Examples: domain:1,master pw SerialPort:0,master pw channel id:0
domain:2,master pw SerialPort:0,master pw channel id:0
domain:3,master pw SerialPort:0,master pw channel id:0
domain:4,master pw SerialPort:0/1/1:0,master pw channel id:4
domain:5,master pw SerialPort:0,master pw channel id:0
domain:6,master pw SerialPort:0,master pw channel id:0
domain:7,master pw SerialPort:0,master pw channel id:0
domain:8,master pw SerialPort:0,master pw channel id:0
domain:1,master pw SerialPort:0,master pw channel id:0
domain:2,master pw SerialPort:0,master pw channel id:0
domain:3,master pw SerialPort:0,master pw channel id:0
domain:4,master pw SerialPort:0/1/1:0,master pw channel id:4
domain:5,master pw SerialPort:0,master pw channel id:0
domain:6,master pw SerialPort:0,master pw channel id:0
domain:7,master pw SerialPort:0,master pw channel id:0
domain:8,master pw SerialPort:0,master pw channel id:0
domain:4,master PW SerialPort:Serial4/0/1:0,master pw channel id:4
ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
The display acr-dcr command displays the current CES ACR information.
Prerequisites
Before using this command, you must configure CES ACR information. Otherwise, no value is displayed or the displayed values are invalid.
